explains: adv. 适当地，适宜地；如其所料地

sentences.en: If a mixed traffic system way was in place, automated driving could begin whenever the driver was on suitably equipped roads.
sentences.cn: "如果有了混合交通系统的方式，只要司机在适当的道路上，自动驾驶就可以开始了。

sentences.en: He felt suitably chastened and apologized.
sentences.cn: 他感到内疚并表示歉意。

sentences.en: I am not really suitably dressed for a party.
sentences.cn: 我穿这样的衣服参加聚会并不十分得体。
